name: Ms dolly
greetingText: Finally the day is here, yayy!!
wishText: I hope you always stay cute, and healthy too ;)
textInChatBox: Best birthday gift for my best friend?
text2: Toh that's what I was going to do.
text4: And I realised, I wanted to do something...
outroText: Wishing you get everything you deserve, and desire! Stay blessed. With Love - Neo <3
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again. (Atleast 3 baar dekhna, mehnat lagi hai)
nextToo: click here to move on to the next surprise
